content:
The document provides configuration settings for various modules and features, including window properties, mouse inputs, rendering options, and notification levels. The chunk focuses on notification severity levels for specific modules (tiff, util, vision, etc.) and notify output configurations, which control logging behavior across the application.

severity of this notify category notify-level-tiff enum unspecified Default severity of this notify category notify-level-uniqueIdAllocator enum unspecified Default severity of this notify category notify-level-util enum unspecified Default severity of this notify category notify-level-vision enum unspecified Default severity of this notify category notify-level-vrpn enum unspecified Default severity of this notify category notify-level-x11display enum unspecified Default severity of this notify category notify-level-xfile enum unspecified Default severity of this notify category notify-output filename The filename to which to write all the output of notify notify-timestamp bool 0 Set true to output the date & time with each notify
